title: Ep 478 | Phil Takes On a Miserable Bathtub Experience & Why Believers Shouldn’t Be Called Christians
description:
Phil shares a laughter-filled story about attempting to bathe in Miss Kay's new bathtub, when he left feeling clean but dissatisfied at best. Jase takes a look at the term "Christian" and explains why it's not quite what Jesus called his followers. Al makes a point about the scriptural difference between a "saint" and the word "holy," and Phil goes into detail about why it's dangerous to be an out-of-touch, bombastic type of person. He shares advice on how to maintain an even keel in your life and having a deep conviction about who Jesus really is. And Jase shares what he always tells his kids: Hope is not a plan when it comes to worldly endeavors.
